Text: Is it possible for you to release this movie also in avi/xvid/ac3 - 1/3 DVD size?
there will be a 1.37 GB XviD/MP3 release
Thanks a lot mate! Are you also planning to release criterion's made in usa in this fashion?
yes. made in usa will be released with an mkv (~2500 kbps bitrate x264 video / ac-3 audio) first, followed by a 1.37 GB xvid/mp3 avi.
